name: Early Fire DPS Combo
description: The go-to starter recipe. Ember Pup deals solid damage and is easy to create at Lab Level 1.

name: Beginner's Tank Build
description: Your first defensive monster. Aqualing can absorb hits while your DPS monsters deal damage.

name: Resource Farming Recipe
description: Sproutling generates passive essence income. Create one early to boost your economy.

name: Pure Fire Power
description: Triple fire essences create the devastating Flame Striker. A must-have for mid-game content.

name: Hybrid Elemental Attacker
description: Mix opposing elements for a versatile fighter that adapts to any matchup.

name: Shadow Assassin Build
description: The fastest monster in the game. Shadow Imp strikes before anyone else can react.

name: Holy Healer Recipe
description: Every team needs a healer. Luminite keeps your team alive through tough battles.

name: Legendary Frost Dragon
description: The ultimate tank. Frost Leviathan has the highest defense in the game. Requires Lab Level 8.
